content: duo the owl from duolingo materials 4 00mm hook 3 5mm hook fibrefill for stuffing sewing needle stitch marker yarn any aran in green and orange any dk in black and white abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - decrease increase - increase slip_stitch - slip_stitch st - stitch c sewitseams pattern notes the crochet wants to be nice and tight so that the fibrefill stuffing doesn t show through pieces are worked in the round so it s easiest to use a stitch marker at the start of each round incase you lose count you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use but please do not use the pattern for commercial sales body 1 magic_ring 8 2 increase x 8 16 3 1 single_crochet increase around 24 4 2xc increase around 32 5 single_crochet around 32 6 single_crochet 15 increase x 2 34 rounds 7 - 26 single_crochet around 34 27 fold in half at the open end and stuff with fibrefill single_crochet around to close this will naturally create the shape of the ears fasten_off and weave in ends wings make 2 1 magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet around 6 3 single_crochet increase around 9 rounds 4 - 5 single_crochet around 9 6 2 single_crochet increase around 12 7 single_crochet around 12 8 3 single_crochet increase around 15 9 at this point we will be working shorter row and turning the work 12 single_crochet chain 1 turn 10 decrease 1 single_crochet 8 decrease 1 chain 1 turn 10 11 decrease 1 single_crochet 8 decrease 1 chain 1 turn 8 note this will go further than where we started the short row in round 10 but don t worry this is correct it allows for the wings to have a slant to them 12 single_crochet 4 fasten_off leaving long end for sewing c sewitseams feet make 2 1 with green aran yarn and 4 00mm hook magic_ring 6 2 increase x 6 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4 single_crochet around 18 5 single_crochet around 18 6 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 7 decrease around 6 8 slip_stitch fasten_off leaving long end for sewing eyes white part - make 2 1 using dk white yarn and 3 5mm hook chain 4 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 in last chain 3 continuing through back loops on the back of the chain single_crochet 2 4 single_crochet 3 in 1st st of chain 5 continuing in the round single_crochet 2 6 single_crochet 3 in next st 7 single_crochet 3 8 single_crochet 3 in next st 9 slip_stitch fasten_off leaving long end for sewing eyes pupil - make 2 1 using dk white yarn and 3 5mm hook chain 4 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 in last chain 3 single_crochet 2 4 slip_stitch fasten_off leaving long end for sewing beak 1 magic_ring 5 2 increase single_crochet x 2 increase 8 3 increase 2 single_crochet
